license_info_your_license_is_about_to_ex: Your license is about to expire!
license_info_expiring_msg: The license for this domain will expire on __date__.
license_info_expired_msg:
The license for this domain expired on __expire_date__.
Please renew your license by __shutdown_date__ to avoid any service disruption.
license_info_renew_license_instructions:
To renew your license, please click the "Renew License" button below.

You can also reach out to our team at info@justdo.com. Our support team is here to assist you with any questions.

Thank you for being a valued member of the JustDo community. We're continuously working on new features to improve your experience!
license_info_please_contact_site_admins: For more information, please reach out to your site administrators, or contact us at info@justdo.com.
license_info_valid_until_and_licensed_us:
This domain is licensed until __date__ for __count__ users.
Thank you for being a valued member of the JustDo community. We're continuously working on new features to improve your experience!
